line_1: With healing hand the saddest sores it skins,
line_2: And covers — oh! — a multitude of sins.

line_1: Cast off, as worn out Cloaths, their sloughy Skins;
line_2: They, when the Bloom of warmer Spring begins,

line_1: The Beasts are cloath'd with beauteous Skins:
line_2: The Fishes arm'd with Scales and Fins;

line_1: Regales the smell, and smooths the ladies' skins.
line_2: The balmy gloss, which on the surface shines,
